mapper.select: select tqms_dept departmentId,tqms_dept_name department from q_single_disease_take where tqms_dept is not null and tqms_dept_name is not null group by tqms_dept,tqms_dept_name

select
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y') date,
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m') date,
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m-%d') date,
count(1) number from q_single_disease_take
and category_id in
#{listItem}
and status=#{status}
and country_report_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{dateStart},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and country_report_time <STR_TO_DATE(#{dateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and tqms_dept in
#{listItem}
group by
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y')
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y') date,
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m') date,
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m-%d') date,
count(1) number from q_single_disease_take
and category_id in
#{listItem}
and status=#{status}
and country_report_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{dateStart},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and country_report_time <STR_TO_DATE(#{dateEnd},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
and tqms_dept in
#{listItem}
group by
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y')
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m')
DATE_FORMAT(country_report_time,'%Y-%m-%d')

select count(1) from q_single_disease_take where out_time is not null and report_status!=0 and (status = 0 or status = 1)
and (tqms_dept =#{dept} or answer_deptid=#{dept})

select count(1) from q_single_disease_take where out_time is not null and report_status!=0 and (status = 3 or status = 7)
and (tqms_dept =#{dept} or answer_deptid=#{dept})
mapper.update: update q_single_disease_take set status = #{status}, country_examine_reason = #{countryExamineReason}, country_report_time = #{time} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, hospital_in_no, patient_name, question_id, question_name, department, country_examine_reason, status, country_report_time, write_time from q_single_disease_take where status in (7, 9) order by id asc limit #{pageNo}, #{pageSize}
select * from q_single_disease_take where status in (7, 9) and id = #{id}

select id, hospital_in_no, patient_name, question_id, question_name, department, country_examine_reason, status, country_report_time, write_time from q_single_disease_take where status in (7, 9) and question_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') order by id asc limit #{pageNo}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from q_single_disease_take where status in (7, 9) and question_name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
select count(*) from q_single_disease_take where status in (7, 9)

SELECT tqms_dept tqmsDept,tqms_dept_name deptName, count(1) needReportCount FROM `q_single_disease_take`
status <> 8
and out_time >=STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and out_time <STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by tqms_dept
